# SubAgent Master Navigation Index

## Core Files
- agents/master.md - Main agent orchestration logic

## Configuration Files
### Knowledge Base
- config/knowledge-base/agent-selection.yaml - Agent selection algorithms
- config/knowledge-base/categorization-engine.yaml - Task categorization system
- config/knowledge-base/parallel_coordination.yaml - Parallel execution coordination
- config/knowledge-base/task-analysis.yaml - Task analysis framework
- config/knowledge-base/tfidf-system.yaml - TF-IDF analysis system

### Core Configuration
- config/core/configuration_loader.yaml - Configuration loading system

### Dynamic Configuration  
- config/dynamic/config_loader.yaml - Dynamic configuration loader
- config/dynamic/enhanced_agent_registry.yaml - Enhanced agent registry

### Rules Configuration
- config/rules/selection_rules.yaml - Agent selection rules
- config/rules/parallel_execution_rules.yaml - Parallel execution rules

## Documentation
- docs/overview.md - Project overview documentation

## Plugin Configuration
- .claude-plugin/ - Plugin metadata and configuration
